tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE markers (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  marker_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  position INT,
  trait_association BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50),
  marker_id INT REFERENCES markers(marker_id),
  trait_id INT REFERENCES traits(trait_id),
  data_collected DATE
);

CREATE TABLE marker_traits (
  marker_id INT,
  trait_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (marker_id, trait_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES markers(marker_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trait_id) REFERENCES traits(trait_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_markers (
  sample_id INT,
  marker_id INT,
  allele VARCHAR(1),
  PRIMARY KEY (sample_id, marker_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES samples(sample_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES markers(marker_id)
);
